text: TEMPLE COLLEGE SCHOOL OF VOCATIONAL NURSING VNSG 1331: PHARMACOLOGY Objectives Module 5 Drugs that affect the Endocrine system Chapters 40 and 41 1. List the various endocrine hormones produced by the body. 2. Discuss the actions, uses, adverse reactions, contraindications, precautions, and interactions of drugs that affect the endocrine system. 3. Implement important pre-administration and ongoing focused assessment activities the nurse should perform on the patient taking a drug that affects the endocrine system. 4. Use the nursing process to implement care for a patient receiving a drug that affects the endocrine system. 5. Identify important points to keep in mind when educating patients and families about the use of the drugs covered in this module.
